articles.description: Luton's Premier League match at Bournemouth is stopped after their captain Tom Lockyer collapses on the pitch.
articles.title: Luton captain Lockyer collapses on pitch

articles.description: Follow live text updates as England face West Indies in the third of five T20s in Grenada.
articles.title: Moeen bowls King in first over of Windies-England third T20

articles.description: Watch BBC Final Score and follow text updates from four Premier League games, including Manchester City v Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Premier League build-up: Man City, Newcastle & Chelsea all in action

articles.description: Text updates from Leinster's game against Sale Sharkes in the European Champions Cup.
articles.title: European Champions Cup - Sale regain lead against Leinster in Dublin

articles.description: Manchester City's stuttering title defence suffers another blow as Michael Olise's 95th-minute penalty rescues a dramatic point for Crystal Palace.
articles.title: Palace deny Man City win with 95th-minute penalty

articles.description: England suffer a 347-run defeat by India in the one-off Test match in Mumbai.
articles.title: England slump to crushing Test defeat by India

articles.description: Martha Thomas' goal gives Tottenham a first Women's Super League victory over north London rivals Arsenal, who squander the chance to move top of the table.
articles.title: Spurs stun Arsenal to claim historic WSL derby win

articles.description: Nathan Lyon moves to 499 career Test wickets as Australia strengthened their control of the first Test against Pakistan on day three.
articles.title: Lyon moves to 499 as Australia dominate Pakistan

articles.description: Lewis Miley, 17, becomes Newcastle's youngest goalscorer in the Premier League as the Magpies beat 10-man Fulham.
articles.title: Miley, 17, scores as Newcastle beat 10-man Fulham

articles.description: Devin Vassell scores a career-high 36 points as the San Antonio Spurs beat the Los Angeles Lakers to end their 18-game losing run.
articles.title: NBA: Devin Vassell helps San Antonio Spurs end losing run against Los Angeles Lakers
